name: Smartwool PhD Outdoor Light Pattern Crew Socks - Unisex
categories: PhD Outdoor Light Pattern Crew Socks
description: Minimalist socks that stay in place when you're out on the trails.Made of soft merino wool, nylon and elastane.4-degree elite fit system uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place.Indestructawool Technology in high-impact areas for comfort.Mesh ventilation zones provide moisture management.Toe is almost seamless.
